modules.description: This module implements UDP client functionality for sending OSC packets over a network. It provides operations to create and destroy client instances, and to send OSC packets to a specified socket address. The module works with OSC packet data structures and Unix socket addresses, enabling direct communication with UDP-based OSC servers.

This module implements UDP server functionality for handling OSC packets. It provides operations to create and destroy a server instance, and to receive packets along with their source addresses. The server processes incoming data into structured OSC packets, handling errors related to unsupported type tags or missing typetag strings.

This module provides UDP-based communication for OSC packets, supporting both client and server operations. It includes data types for OSC packets and socket addresses, with functions to send packets to a target address or receive and process incoming packets. Users can create a client to transmit OSC data to a remote server or set up a server to listen for and decode OSC messages from various sources. Example usage includes sending sensor data over a network or building an OSC responder that reacts to incoming commands.

This module enables UDP-based OSC communication, supporting both client and server roles. It defines data types for OSC packets and socket addresses, with operations to send and receive encoded OSC data. Users can transmit sensor readings to a remote endpoint or implement a server that listens for and decodes incoming OSC commands. Example applications include networked music controllers and interactive installations responding to OSC messages.
